titleStmt.title: Suspiria, or Sighs on the death of the late Most Illustrious Monarch Charles the II. King of Great Britain, France and Ireland, &c. who changed his earthly for a heavenly crown, on Fryday the 6th. of February 1684/5. in the 37th year of his reign, and 55th of his age.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Can Great, Illustrious Britains Monarch, Dye ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
